trans-unit.source: Provides information about an Authenticode signature for a manifest.
trans-unit.target: 提供資訊清單的 Authenticode 簽章的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得簽署憑證的描述。

trans-unit.source: The description of the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: 簽署憑證的描述。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description URL of the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得簽署憑證的描述 URL。

trans-unit.source: The description URL of the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: 簽署憑證的描述 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash algorithm used to compute the signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來計算簽章的雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm used to compute the signature.
trans-unit.target: 用來計算簽章的雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the HRESULT value from verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: 從驗證簽章取得 HRESULT 值。

trans-unit.source: The HRESULT value from verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: 來自驗證簽章的 HRESULT 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the chain of certificates used to verify the Authenticode signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來驗證 Authenticode 簽章的憑證鏈結。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain" /> object that contains the certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain" /> 物件，包含憑證鏈結。

trans-unit.source: for the right to enumerate certificates.
trans-unit.target: 提供列舉憑證的權限。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the certificate that signed the manifest.
trans-unit.target: 取得簽署資訊清單的憑證。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the certificate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> 物件，代表憑證。

trans-unit.source: for the right to enumerate certificates.
trans-unit.target: 提供列舉憑證的權限。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the time stamp that was applied to the Authenticode signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得套用至 Authenticode 簽章的時間戳記。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.TimestampInformation" /> object that contains the signature time stamp.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.TimestampInformation" /> 物件，包含簽章的時間戳記。

trans-unit.source: The time stamp is expressed in local time.
trans-unit.target: 時間戳記是以本地時間表示。

trans-unit.source: The time stamp is available only if the publisher that signed the time stamp is trusted.
trans-unit.target: 時間戳記才會提供信任發行者簽署的時間戳記。

trans-unit.source: Gets the trustworthiness of the Authenticode signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Authenticode 簽章的信任度。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.TrustStatus" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.TrustStatus" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the result of verifying the Authenticode signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得驗證 Authenticode 簽章的結果。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SignatureVerificationResult" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SignatureVerificationResult" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A positive verification returns <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SignatureVerificationResult.Valid>.
trans-unit.target: 正數驗證傳回<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SignatureVerificationResult.Valid>。
